Texts.Chs: 波尔儿！我想有一阵子没人坐在这里了。
Texts.Eng: Brr! I suppose no one's sat here for a while.

Texts.Chs: 这把椅子在弗洛兰家的冰箱里是个不错的选择。
Texts.Eng: Chair will make excellent freezer back at Floran'ss place.

Texts.Chs: 要么经营这个地方的人真的致力于他们的审美，要么空调开得太高。
Texts.Eng: Either the people running this place are really dedicated to their aesthetic or the AC is turned up way too high.

Texts.Chs: 我担心在这个座位上坐太久会僵住。
Texts.Eng: I fear I may freeze in place sitting in this seat for too long.

Texts.Chs: 做一个活明星的好处之一就是总是有一个温暖的座位。
Texts.Eng: One of the perks of bein' a livin' star is always havin' a warm seat.

Texts.Chs: 这把椅子太小了，我坐不舒服...
Texts.Eng: This chair is a little too small for me to be comfortable...

Texts.Chs: 为什么大家都说这里的座位很冷？我感觉很好。
Texts.Eng: Why does everyone keep saying the seats here are cold? I feel just fine.
